channel.title: Allstar v2 tut, how to make the well at home give you a partyhat using a Cracker

item.title: Allstar v2 tut, how to make the well at home give you a partyhat using a Cracker
item.dc:creator: @runescape_sucks runescape sucks
item.description:
@runescape_sucks wrote:

Difficulty:1/10
Files edited:Client.java
Assumed knowlege:Copy and paste Ctrl+f

This is my first guide.

First open up client.java and search for

            } else if (useItemID == 995 && atObjectID == 884)// well

then you will see

} else if (useItemID == 995 && atObjectID == 884)// well if(actionTimer == 0) if(playerHasItemAmount(995, 70000000)==false) { sendMessage("You Need 70m to drop in the well"); } else if(playerHasItemAmount(995, 70000000)==true) { deleteItem(995, getItemSlot(995), 70000000); sendMessage("YOUR WISH HAS CAME TRUE!"); addItem(Item2.randomwell(), 1); sendMessage("Unfortanatly you need to wait 1 HOUR to make another wish!"); actionTimer = 3600;
Then replace all that with

} else if (useItemID == 962 && atObjectID == 884)// well if(actionTimer == 0) if(playerHasItemAmount(962, 1)==false) { sendMessage("You Need a christmas cracker to drop in the well"); } else if(playerHasItemAmount(962, 1)==true) { deleteItem(995, getItemSlot(962), 1); sendMessage("YOUR WISH HAS CAME TRUE!"); addItem(1040, 1); sendMessage("U got a yellow phat from a christmas cracker"); actionTimer = 3600;

credits
50% me for making tut
50% allstar for making source
i dont think anyone has posted this i didnt know if somone already had.

Read full topic
item.source: Allstar v2 tut, how to make the well at home give you a partyhat using a Cracker
